unnormalised: Kindly note that ferry services from Mumbai to Goa, operated by M/s. XYZ Cruises, are temporarily suspended until further notice, commencing 15/07/2024, due to monsoon season. Please contact 1800-11-2233 for updates on resumption of services.
normalised: Kindly note that ferry services from Mumbai to Goa, operated by M-s. X-Y-Z Cruises, are temporarily suspended until further notice, commencing fifteenth july two thousand and twenty four, due to monsoon season. Please contact one eight hundred hyphen eleven hyphen two two three three for updates on resumption of services.
